metadata.description: FDA regulatory tools for medical device 510(k) analysis, predicate extraction, and submission preparation. v5.25.0 adds PreSTAR XML generation for Pre-Submission meetings with 6 meeting types, 35-question bank, and auto-detection. v5.23.0 adds AI-powered standards generation with 100% product code coverage.

plugins.name: fda-tools
plugins.description: AI-powered FDA 510(k) regulatory assistant with 51 commands, 12 agents â€” NEW v5.25.0: PreSTAR XML generation for Pre-Submission meetings with 6 meeting types, 35-question bank, and auto-detection | v5.23.0: AI-powered standards generation with 100% product code coverage (agent-based, no API keys required) | Phase 5: workflow orchestration, streaming processor, semantic search | Phase 4: ML-powered predicate recommendations, automated gap analysis | Phase 3: MAUDE peer comparison, competitive intelligence | Phase 1-2: data provenance, quality validation, CFR citations | Core features: predicate extraction, substantial equivalence analysis, submission drafting, FDA review simulation, safety surveillance, guidance lookup, standards generation, and full eSTAR/PreSTAR export | Agent-based architecture uses installing user's Claude Code access
